actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To reliquidate certain entries on which excessive countervailing duties were paid, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides, upon request filed with the appropriate customs officer, for the reliquidation (refund) of excessive countervailing duties (plus interest) that were imposed on specified entries into the United States.

titles.title: To reliquidate certain entries on which excessive countervailing duties were paid, and for other purposes.
